name: Potassium hypochlorite
desc: Potassium hypochlorite (chemical formula KOCl) is the potassium salt of hypochlorous acid. It is used in variable concentrations, often diluted in water solution. It has a light grey color and a strong chlorine smell. It can be used as a disinfectant.
Other anions:
Potassium chloride
Potassium chlorite
Potassium chlorate
Potassium perchlorate
Other cations:
Sodium hypochlorite
Lithium hypochlorite
Calcium hypochlorite
